summary: When Pikachu is taken to the Tree of Beginnings by the playful Mew, Ash Ketchum and friends are guided to the tree by Lucario, a time-displaced Pokémon who seeks answers regarding the betrayal of his master.
cast: Veronica Taylor|Eric Stuart|Amy Birnbaum|Madeleine Blaustein|Rachael Lillis|Ikue Ôtani|Jeff Berman|Darren Dunstan|Suzanne Goldish|Dan Green|Jason Griffith|Christopher Collet|Mike Pollock|Kayzie Rogers|Sean Schemmel|Erica Schroeder|Rebecca Soler|Lindsey Warner|Oliver Wyman|Unshô Ishizuka|Christa Lips|Daisuke Namikawa|James Carter Cathcart|Megumi Hayashibara|Atsushi Kakehashi|Kunihiro Kawamoto|Satomi Kôrogi|Eiji Miyashita|Amy Palant|Kôichi Sakaguchi|Tara Sands
title: Pokémon: Lucario y el misterio de Mew
